name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Quiet little park. Some campsites backing on residential. Adequate spacing between sites.   Picturesque river but no real place to swim...only good wading for kids.  Off-leash fenced dog park near the water. Adjacent town has basic amenities.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: We only had an overnight stay at this park, but We loved it. Nice sites, clean bathrooms, good showers, friendly staff. The waterfalls are nice. The swimming area looks good as well although we weren't able to try it on our stay.  This is a nice quiet park.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful woodsy park that was empty except for our camper, in September 2018.  Mind you, it was raining buckets. Sites were large with wooded verges visually separating the sites. My only downer was having to pay for electricity even though we didn't use any. And the train that loudly whistled by across the river

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review:
The water at this beach is warm and clean...ideal for little children.
There is a warning for older children who might wander off. Don't. Don't go down river from here. Can't swim there! It's very dangerous to follow this river too near ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great, flat site with water spigots everywhere. We watched the grounds crew cleaning up sites and they do a great job. Lots of great hiking spots and very clean and easy showers.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: been going to chutes for the last 30 years and always a great time

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review:
Good for relaxed camping but not if you are looking to escape into the back woods. River swimming and a 6km trail are the highlights for us. Showers are also a plus.

If you're looking to go for a swim, our family always brings a few ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful waterfalls. Nice campground. Really nice main toilet building.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park but can see city street lights at night ... too close to people's houses

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: This park is a hidden gem. The only thing missing for me are the lack of biking trails. Very clean comfort stations. Good privacy and very nice walking trails. The water was warm but be wary of the river currents.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Nice size campground. Nice swimming area at bottom of the falls which has low and deep areas. Great for families. Wheel chair assesible washroom and campsites. Clean washrooms and showers.Very nice groomed trails. Large lots. Close to little towns and Sudbury.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Really nice park, sites are a nice size. We had plenty of room with our 28ft trailer and pick up truck. Bathrooms are very clean. The mosquitoes were the only bad thing about our stay.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great  Camping... Quite and lots are well spaced out.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review:
Beauty location. Also as a bonus, given its proximity to Massey allows the park to use the municipal water supply, meaning that water does not have to be boiled before drinking.
Beauty trails with great scenery ...especially the falls!!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: The falls are a great place to explore - we spent the whole day there. Campsites were well maintained and a good size. Could hear noise from town, including a party going on at a cottage just on the other side of the fence. Good place for a one or two night stopover on a family trip

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Big treed sites with electrical only. Hot, clean showers and great water pressure  Friendly park staff and beautiful scenery. Highly recommend. We stayed two nights in a 24 foot 5th wheel.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Few hundred meters from trans Canada highway. Nice camp ground close to River and scenic water falls.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review:
Nice park for stop overs....the dumping station needs to have trees cut down so that bigger vehicles can navigate the turn easier and not worry about damage. 
The same goes for getting into some sites....trees need to be removed in order to have a better turning radius....other than that the provincial parks are wonderful

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful waterfront quiet park

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Had a great weekend.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Nice place to camp for a night or two. Cleanest bathrooms and showers I ever experienced in any government park in North America

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Awesome for family.  Great swimming areas for little and big kids.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Frigid night in mid July but stunning views and quieter than the other parks along Lake Superior

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review:
Nice place!
The only downsides are the damn train at night and the power distributor location.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: I love this little park. Really nice campsites and swimming area with the chute.  Love the trail.  Good food in town.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: We stayed for two nights. Had a great time!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great park. Very quiet. Very clean

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Smaller park but a great place for a stay.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: This is my favorite P.P. It is so beautiful and peaceful.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful scenery along an easy hiking trail.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: We loved this Provincial Park.  We stayed at campsite 59.  Absolutely great great spot.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Large private sites in radio free zone. Could hear the falls all night - awesome! This park features a trail that wins past the 'seven sisters' or 7 small rapids/chutes. Very picturesque.  I actually was able to do a 5 km trail run on ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Camped at this park on my way to Manitoba. I really enjoyed my time here. My campsite was surrounded by beautiful pine trees, which offered a comforting place to stay for the night. I soon found out that a few steps away from my campsite ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great park! It was quiet and peaceful. Staff were always friendly. Amazing trail and waterfalls. Only downside was he beach, expected an actual beach but this was mostly pebbled. Would suggest adding a bit more sand as we had looked forward to swimming and lying on the shore! Everything else was great though.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Pretty cool place, wish i had more than just a couple hours there. perfect place to take a doggo with ya. Be weary of the rocks near the water, wearing boots I slipped on em like they were made of ice and almost went for a swim

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great winter hike.  Snowshoes were not needed on this day as the trail has been broken.  Trekking poles are still a good idea with some icy spots.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great swimming area. Excellent food truck parked near the entrance in the summer that serves 'Indian tacos'. Lovely place to spend the day!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great park. Nice walking trails and scenery.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: I hate this place. All the smoke fills the town in summer. Everyone on this side of town is at risk of smoke inhalation

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Good camping facilities with a great waterfall...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: This is a fairly small park with a lot to offer. It has a nice long hiking trail that follows the rapids then loops back around and there is plenty of shade everywhere in the park. The swimming area is a large hole at the bottom of the ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: The Chutes is a fun little park! Most parks have a lake with a beach, Chutes has a river with some small rapids you can splash around in.  Lots of large, private campsites, dog use area and some hiking trails.  It's more of a stop-over or stay 2-3 nights type of place.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Very pretty small park, good clean sites. One of the most beautiful trails past several falls. Great park for a weekend or a 2 or 3 day stopover.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: We had an awesome time here. Our site was close enough to the water falls that you could hear it all day and night which we loved . Natural sound machine ! Our site was also perfectly private so find a location near the falls if you can ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Nice park, very clean and modern washrooms and showers. The pit toilets were well maintained and didn't smell. Good trails with nice scenery. Park is close to a general store that has many flavours of ice cream and a chip stand.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: A beautiful park!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: The trails and scenery are absolutely amazing! A very clean and quiet park.  A Definite recommend and we will be back!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: The best feature of this park is the waterfalls! You must hike around the many waterfalls and rapids then you will see the natural beauty of this park.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful place! Only stopped to see the water fall on our adventure to Sault ste Marie. I would highly recommend checking it out. I plan to go camping there at some point

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great camping trip as always!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: My new favourite camping location! My partner and I stayed in the RF zone and it was so quiet and peaceful! The staff were friendly and helpful, the only reason I docked one star is due to the cleanliness of the bathrooms. I recommend ...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great place.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Lovely stay! Many large, private lots. A bit of a smaller park, but nevertheless beautiful.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Very clean and well run park in a very quiet Ontario community. The water falls and river are very scenic. Great staff

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: This is an excellent stop over place if your heading east or west. Great Camp ground. Friendly staff.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Just a basic park with just the right amount of amenities. It has a nice quite park feel.  Good swimming below the waterfalls.  Close to the small town of Massy.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park , staff is awesome

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Very nice place...

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Very nice place for a hike and to explore.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Big sites decent power options. Sites for traditional camping. Hiking, fishing biking. Fresh baked goods at hwy entrance  on Fridays.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Top notch customer service...Kudos to the young man who served us @ 930pm Sunday August 13,2017...An asset to the Park. Friendly Kind Soul...Your parents would be proud!!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Very large private sites. Hydro is being added to a lot of sites. Nice sandy beach for a swim.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: VERY QUIET PARK, DECENT PRIVACY; GREAT TIME AROUND MASSEY FAIR

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Gorgeous! Secluded. Waterfalls are beautiful. Clean and comfortable.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: The park staff were friendly and helpful showers and bathrooms were clean and well-kept

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: We loved it!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Excellent park and I must make a point of camping there in the future

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Didnt have time to look around but it was a great visit

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Quiet not crowded

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: What a beautiful park!  Calm with many private sites that are quite shaded.  Gorgeous walking trails.  Rocky beach with very little shade, but shallow and perfect for kids.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Nice trail, nice community, nice waterfall. Peaceful place to camp

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: I could not find the info i needed

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Best swimming area locally. Rapids beside the beach are fun to float down during summer water levels. Hiking trail is short, but scenic.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Love it, can't wait to go back.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Awesome park! Swimming area/beach is nice and campsites are not crowded together like alot of other provincial parks. Will be back!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: It's a place to sleep. Little to do. Rather boring. It's clean. But it's just a place to spend the night on the way to a better place.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Beautiful!

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great spot beside the Trans-Canada. The only provincial park between Sudbury and Sault. Site 72 was good - site 83 also looked good.

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Great fishing

name: Chutes Provincial Park
review: Another great location  to camp. The lake to swim in is nice for the family.

review: Loved it

review: It's lovely and quiet. The falls are fun to watch.

review:
